name: NameLetters
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: name letters
des:
You and Alexa take turns guessing girls and boys names, beginning with a selected letter of the alphabet.

Alexa will tell you when it's your turn. If you don't answer, Alexa will prompt you to respond for a second time. If you still fail to answer then the game will time out.

If you can't think of an answer you can say "Don't know". If that happens Alexa will win the game but she will also suggest answers you could have given so you can learn for future games.

You can select which letter to play by saying “Alexa, Play Letter" (then your chosen letter). For example “Alexa, Play Letter F” or “Alexa, Play Letter W”.

Name Letters doesn’t support the letters: Q, U, X, Y and Z, as there are so few names starting with those letters.

Enjoy!

Name Letters Scoring System:
------------------------------------------
• 5 answers in a row - Jade
• 10 answers in a row - Amber
• 15 answers in a row - Beryl
• 20 answers in a row - Pearl
• 25 answers in a row – Ruby

Leader Board Frequently Asked Questions.
--------------------------------------------------
Q – Do the scores and ranks on the Leader Board include every Name Letters player in the world?
A – Yes. The Leader Board is a Global Leader Board, covering ALL Name Letters players, wherever they are in the world.

Q – Is the Leader Board real time?
A – Yes. The Leader Board is updated continuously, in real time, so you always get the latest information.

Q - Even though I won a game, my rank stayed the same, or went down! How is that even possible?
A – This can happen if players above you break away from sharing their score with other players. For example, let’s say 2 players above you on the Leader Board share the same score. They will be in joint place. However, if one of them increases their score then they will no longer share a score and instead of there being just one joint place above you there will be 2 separate places above you, and so you’ll be pushed down the rankings.

Your favourite name missing?
-----------------------------------------
I am certain that not every name is included in Name Letters.
So please accept my apologies if your name is not present.
But I hope you’ll still enjoy the game!

Feedback
-------------
I hope you’ll love Name Letters. If you have any issues, please let me know on the Name Letters Facebook page, or by e-mail at animal.letters@gmail.com

------------------
